meanings.definition: A plant or plant part valued for its medicinal, savory, or aromatic qualities.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother grows various herbs in her garden for making herbal tea.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a pinch of herbs to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The herbs in the garden whispered to each other about their healing powers.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the herbs filled the room, transporting me to a peaceful meadow.
meanings.sent5: The herbs in the pot seemed to dance as they released their fragrant essence.

meanings.definition: Any plant with leaves, seeds, or flowers used for flavoring, food, medicine, or perfume.
meanings.sent1: The chef added a handful of fresh herbs to the soup for a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent2: In the market, you can find a variety of herbs to spice up your meals.
meanings.sent3: The herbs in the kitchen cabinet had a party every time the door was closed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of herbs, adding joy to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The herbs in the garden swayed in the breeze, creating a fragrant symphony.
